backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining topics, subtopics, revision schedules, user profiles, and authorization checks with CRUD and interval‑retrieval logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of major frontend files and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind and OKLCH‑based global theme variables and styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the React frontend and loading the main application entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile initialization, theming, and routing into the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Monthly calendar showing study and planned revision events plus due/pending reviews using shared reviewStatus logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, theme toggle, and login/logout logic integrated with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SettingsView.tsx: Manages user settings for study intervals and preferred review days, loading defaults and saving updates. Provides UI for editing interval lists and toggling review days.
frontend/src/components/SubTopicSchedule: Displays a dialog showing a subtopic’s study and revision dates, including status indicators. Fetches planned revision dates and renders them with contextual styling.
frontend/src/components/TodayView.tsx: Shows the daily revision dashboard with due and overdue subtopics based on selected date. Allows marking reviews as completed and reviewing schedule details.
Displays details of a main topic along with its subtopics, separating active and completed ones. Supports opening a schedule view for individual subtopics.
frontend/src/components/TopicDialog.tsx: Dialog for creating or editing main topics and subtopics, including fields for titles, descriptions, difficulty, and study dates. Submits changes via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/TopicsView.tsx: UI component that displays main topics and subtopics with editing, deleting, viewing, scheduling, and completion actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating topics, user profiles, schedules, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page with tabbed navigation between Today, Topics, Calendar, and Settings views.
frontend/src/utils/reviewStatus.ts: Utility functions to compute due reviews and planned study/revision items for a given date.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides conversions between bigint ICP timestamps and JS Dates, plus helpers for day boundaries, date comparisons, and generating date keys.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage with optional cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata outlining the scheduling app’s purpose, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature requirements.
